name: Sex Play - College Girls
description:
A quick and dirty game made for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. Enjoy the story of two female students getting naughty in their dorm room.

GAME DESCRIPTION
Sex Play – College Girls will definitely arouse your senses!

They just moved into their new dorm room and are ready to get to know each other better.
The decision to take a shower together will definitely change their friendship forever.
Watch how Lily and Emma take care of each other’s needs, and don’t be afraid to put them in various positions.

This game presents you sexy characters, steamy stories, and high quality graphics.

FEATURES

- HD renders
- HD animations
